title: NBA’s Bismack Gives Back
description:
NBA Charlotte Hornets Bismack Biyombo is a force on the basketball court – and an even more meaningful one in his native Democratic Republic of The Congo.

Learn more about the Bismack Biyombo Foundation

Follow Bismack Biyombo on Twitter and Instagram

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
